page.title: 02AGRICULTURE-a general view
page.content: The survey area covers about 1280 hectares(ha),96% of which is farmed. The soil is mainly medium loam tending towards heavy loam in the south-west. 86% of the farmed area is grassland, the rest being laid to corn with 8 ha. of soft fruit and 1 ha. of glasshouses There are 16 agricultural holdings in the area ranging from 320 ha. down to smallholdings of 4-6 ha.The average sized commercially farmed holding is around 100 ha.Most holdings are family farmed by owner-occupiers.Two farms are tenanted,the largest holding is professionally managed for private owners and another is managed for Showerings Ltd.-a public company.Of the 16 holdings,4 are dairy,2 dairy and cereal,1 dairy cereals and beef,1 beef and cereals,1 sheep and cereals,3 beef only,1 horticulture,1 stud farm,1 stables and 1 farm let as grass keep.
